title: Community health outreach reaches 500 people
summary: Mobile clinics and health education reached hundreds with vaccinations and preventive care.
body: In partnership with local health volunteers, TSD organised mobile outreach visits providing basic health checks, maternal care advice and vaccinations. The outreach strengthened referral links to nearby clinics.

body_blocks.text: Volunteers were trained in basic screening and referral procedures to ensure continuity of care for those needing follow-up.
Community awareness sessions covered hygiene, nutrition and maternal-child health topics.
